title: Design Matters from the Archive: Brian Rea
description: Debbie talks to Brian Rea about the value of being rejected, about art directing for the New York Times, and about his development as an illustrator.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to Brian Rea about the value of being rejected, about art directing for the New York Times, and about his development as an illustrator.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
